survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Subscription-Based Meal Planning Services
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of subscription-based meal planning services to understand their satisfaction levels, preferences, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How long have you been using the subscription-based meal planning service?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice question format to simplify data analysis.

script.question_text: How long have you been using the subscription-based meal planning service?

questions.question_text: What factors influenced your decision to subscribe to this service? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture a comprehensive view of user motivations.

script.question_text: What factors influenced your decision to subscribe to this service? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how satisfied are you with the variety of meal options provided? (1 = Very dissatisfied, 5 = Very satisfied)
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for standardized satisfaction measurement.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how satisfied are you with the variety of meal options provided? (1 = Very dissatisfied, 5 = Very satisfied)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the meal planning service?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended responses can provide valuable qualitative insights.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the meal planning service?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this service to others? (1 = Not at all likely, 10 = Extremely likely)
questions.client_notes: Use a Net Promoter Score (NPS) scale for benchmarking.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this service to others? (1 = Not at all likely, 10 = Extremely likely)
